snippet: The high levels were caused by naturally occurring background radon, not by any faults at the aging plant, the operating company said.
abstract: Sellafield nuclear reprocessing plant says elevated radiation levels detected nearby were caused by naturally occurring background radon, not by any faults at the aging plant.
lead_paragraph: The high levels were caused by naturally occurring background radon, not by any faults at the aging plant, the operating company said.

headline.main: British Nuclear Reprocessing Plant Detected Elevated Radiation Levels
headline.print_headline: Britain: Nuclear Reprocessing Plant Detected Elevated Radiation Levels
